Edward Milsom was a professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1890s. He played at club level for Wakefield Trinity, as a  or . He played  in Wakefield Trinity's first ever match in the Northern Union (now the Rugby Football League), the 0-11 defeat by Bradford F.C. during the inaugural 1895â€“96 season at Park Avenue, Bradford on Saturday 7 September 1895.
